document.full_text: the united states is starting to use armed predator drones in libya to target muammar gaddafi's forces after president barack obama approved their use, defense secretary robert gates said thursday.
document.title: u.s. begins using armed drones in libya: gates
lines_and_colors: the united states is starting to use armed predator drones in libya to target muammar gaddafi's forces after president barack obama approved their use, defense secretary robert gates said thursday.
